Title: Relates to exempting municipalities from fees for attachments to utility poles that promote public safety
Summary: Exempts municipalities from fees for attachments to utility poles that promote public safety pursuant to article twenty-four of the vehicle and traffic law.
LawCode: Amd ยง119-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to exempting municipalities from fees for attachments to utility poles that promote public safety
